text: "All Night Long" is a song performed by Simon Mathew, written by Jacob Launbjerg, Svend Gudiksen and Nis Bøgvad. It won the Danish Melodi Grand Prix 2008, and is the Danish entry to the Eurovision Song Contest 2008. The song was performed in the second semi-final of Eurovision on 22 May 2008, where it competed against eighteen other Eurovision entries, and was put through to the final on 24 May after a public vote, getting 15th place with 60 points. The song was succeeded as Danish representative at the 2009 contest by Niels Brinck with "Believe Again". == Chart positions == {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Chart (2008) !align="left"|Peak position |- |Denmark Singles ChartDenmark Singles Chart |align="center"|12 |- |Sweden Singles ChartSweden Singles Chart |align="center"|56 |- |} == See also == * Denmark in the Eurovision Song Contest 2008 == External links == *Biography, Photo, Video == References == Category:Eurovision songs of Denmark Category:Eurovision songs of 2008 Category:2008 songs
title: All Night Long (Simon Mathew song)
